Text:
@extremezone: thanks !
By the way, your explanations works with the avenged version too.

Thanks for this! 

Fuck the guy above who bitched about other uploads. With games being 6GB and bigger...you cannot have too many uploads. It helps spread the fun!!!

@liquidmonkey, How old are you? id Software has called him BJ since before you were born probably, back when the game didn't need a story because killing Nazi's in the first real FPS was cool enough by itself.

And Activision didn't develop this, they're just a publisher. It was id and Raven.
@swebarb, This one seems to be the most complete, cracked, DVD quality one I've found so far. Thanks extremezone!

@Medevila
thx you for recognizing the classics...ppl now a days think "OH THIS GAME IS SO AWESOME" but know nothing of the original that started it all.
